meanings.definition: The two muscles forming the calf of the leg, having two heads or points of origin and inserting into the Achilles tendon.
meanings.sent1: The gastrocnemii help you push off the ground when you walk.
meanings.sent2: Athletes often strengthen their gastrocnemii muscles to improve their running performance.
meanings.sent3: The gastrocnemii muscles are like springs in your legs, propelling you forward with each step.
meanings.sent4: Her powerful gastrocnemii seemed to give her an extra boost in the race.
meanings.sent5: The tightness in his gastrocnemii made it difficult for him to bend his ankles.
